modName: Quick Reflexes Slow Time Fix - No More Getting Stuck
summary: This is a very tiny mod that fixes the bug that causes Quick Reflexes in the Block perk tree to become stuck on the player. With this installed, the slow time effect will be dispelled after one second, as intended, every time.
descriptionHtml:
[b][SIZE=7]What does this mod do?[/SIZE]

[/b]This mod prevents the Slow Time effect from the Quick Reflexes perk in the Block tree from becoming stuck on the player when blocking multiple power attacks at once. In vanilla, the player can easily become stuck in Slow Time when the effect incorrectly stacks on top of itself. Normally, you'd have to save and load or use console commands to fix this problem, but with this mod installed, you shouldn't encounter the problem at all. This mod has no long-running scripts and is safe to install/uninstall at any time. If you've got another mod that makes changes to Quick Reflexes, just put this one lower in your load order.

Now you can freely use Quick Reflexes without having to worry about the bug that causes so many of us to avoid taking the perk.

To install, simply use the mod manager of your choice, or put the .esp in your Skyrim\Data folder and the script in the Skyrim\Data\Scripts. The only script is called ModQuickReflexesFix for easy removal. It does not run for long and is 100% safe to use.

Enjoy! Feel free to leave any feedback in the comments section and let me know if you encounter any issues.
